name: Reign of the Demon Lord
description:
Reign of the Demon Lord is a tactical turn-based RPG game that follows the Demon Lord, who gained his power after eating an enchanted mushroom, as he fends off waves of heroes and adventurers that want his head to gain fame and riches.  Fight and loot through the incoming waves of enemies that just keeps getting stronger as prepare to meet the 'final boss', the Chosen Four.
